title: Math23k_1534
description: Question:有一堆糖果，其中奶糖占45%，再放入16块水果糖后，奶糖就只占25%．那么，这堆糖中有奶糖多少块．
full litex:
claim:
    forall x, milk, total_after R:
        milk = 0.45 * x
        total_after = x + 16
        milk = 0.25 * total_after
        =>:
            milk = 9
    prove:
        milk = 0.25 * (x + 16) = 0.25 * x + 0.25 * 16 = 0.25 * x + 4
        milk = 0.45 * x
        0.45 * x = 0.25 * x + 4
        0.45 * x - 0.25 * x = 4
        (0.45 - 0.25) * x = 4
        0.2 * x = 4
        x = 4 / 0.2 = 20
        milk = 0.45 * 20 = 9

title: Math23k_9308
description: Question:一条彩带剪下两段，第一段占总长的(5/12)，第二段占总长的(1/4)，剩下的占总长的几分之几？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total, first, second, remaining R:
        first = 5 / 12
        second = 1 / 4
        remaining = 1 - first - second
        =>:
            remaining = 1 / 3
    prove:
        second = 1 / 4 = 3 / 12
        remaining = 1 - 5 / 12 - 3 / 12
        remaining = 1 - 8 / 12
        remaining = 12 / 12 - 8 / 12
        remaining = 4 / 12
        remaining = 1 / 3

title: Math23k_12638
description: Question:某电视机厂原计划每月生产彩电3000台，结果上半月完成了原计划的60%，下半月比上半月多完成了(1/10)．求全月生产的彩电比原计划超额百分之几？

claim:
    forall plan_month, upper_half, lower_half, total_actual, excess_percent R:
        plan_month = 3000
        upper_half = plan_month * 0.6
        lower_half = upper_half + upper_half * 0.1
        total_actual = upper_half + lower_half
        excess_percent = (total_actual - plan_month) / plan_month * 100
        =>:
            excess_percent = 26
    prove:
        upper_half = 3000 * 0.6 = 1800
        lower_half = 1800 + 1800 * 0.1 = 1980
        total_actual = 1800 + 1980 = 3780
        excess_percent = (3780 - 3000) / 3000 * 100 = 780 / 3000 * 100 = 26

title: Math23k_7296
description: Question:一辆公共汽车上有一些乘客，到文化路站时，有(2/5)的人下车，又上来了30人，这时车上的乘客正好是原来的(6/5)．车上原有乘客多少人？
full litex:
claim:
    forall original, remaining, after_enter R:
        remaining = original * (1 - 2/5)
        after_enter = remaining + 30
        after_enter = (6/5) * original
        =>:
            original = 50
    prove:
        remaining = original * (3/5)
        after_enter = (3/5)*original + 30
        (3/5)*original + 30 = (6/5)*original
        30 = (6/5)*original - (3/5)*original
        30 = (3/5)*original
        original = 30 * (5/3) = 50

title: Math23k_8399
description: Question:一个股民以每股10.5元买进某股票2000股后，又以每股13.75元全部卖出．此过程中无论是买进还是卖出他均需缴纳交易额为0.3%作为手续费，这位股民买卖这种股票赚了多少钱？
full litex:
claim:
    forall buy_price, sell_price, shares, buy_fee_rate, sell_fee_rate, total_cost, total_income, profit R:
        buy_price = 10.5
        sell_price = 13.75
        shares = 2000
        buy_fee_rate = 0.003
        sell_fee_rate = 0.003
        total_cost = buy_price * shares + (buy_price * shares) * buy_fee_rate
        total_income = sell_price * shares - (sell_price * shares) * sell_fee_rate
        profit = total_income - total_cost
        =>:
            profit = 6354.5
    prove:
        total_cost = 10.5 * 2000 + (10.5 * 2000) * 0.003 = 21000 + 63 = 21063
        total_income = 13.75 * 2000 - (13.75 * 2000) * 0.003 = 27500 - 82.5 = 27417.5
        profit = 27417.5 - 21063 = 6354.5

    forall t, distance R:
        32 * t - 30 * t = 16
        distance = 32 * t + 30 * t
        =>:
            distance = 496
    prove:
        32 * t - 30 * t = 16
        2 * t = 16
        t = 16 / 2 = 8
        distance = 32 * 8 + 30 * 8

        distance = 256 + 240 = 496

description: Question:甲骑自行车追赶前面步行的乙，乙的速度是每分钟60米，甲的速度是每分钟150米．甲出发8分钟追上了乙，那么乙比甲早出发多少分钟．
full litex:
claim:
    forall distance_m, speed_m, speed_e, time_m, time_e R:
        speed_m = 150
        speed_e = 60
        time_m = 8
        distance_m = speed_m * time_m
        distance_m = speed_e * (time_e + time_m)
        =>:
            time_e = 12
    prove:
        distance_m = 150 * 8 = 1200
        1200 = 60 * (time_e + 8)
        1200 = 60 * time_e + 480
        1200 - 480 = 60 * time_e
        720 = 60 * time_e
        time_e = 720 / 60 = 12

description: Question:菜场运来黄瓜250千克，运来黄瓜比西红柿少(1/6)，运来西红柿和黄瓜共多少千克？
full litex:
claim:
    forall cucumber, tomato, total R:
        cucumber = 250
        cucumber = tomato - (1 / 6) * tomato
        total = cucumber + tomato
        =>:
            total = 550
    prove:
        cucumber = 250
        250 = tomato - (1 / 6) * tomato
        250 = (1 - 1 / 6) * tomato
        250 = (5 / 6) * tomato
        tomato = 250 / (5 / 6)
        tomato = 250 * (6 / 5)
        tomato = 300
        total = 250 + 300 = 550

title: Math23k_21347
description: Question:六年级有学生112人，其中男生占(5/8)，后来又转来女生若干人，这时男生和女生人数的比是5：4．现在女生有多少人？
full litex:
prop ratio(a R, b R, m R, n R)
know forall a, b, m, n R => $ratio(a, b, m, n) <=> n * a = m * b

claim:
    forall total, male_ratio, initial_male, initial_female, x, now_female R:
        total = 112
        male_ratio = 5/8
        initial_male = total * male_ratio
        initial_female = total - initial_male
        now_female = initial_female + x
        $ratio(initial_male, now_female, 5, 4)
        =>:
            now_female = 56
    prove:
        initial_male = 112 * (5/8)
        initial_male = 70

        initial_female = 112 - 70
        initial_female = 42

        now_female = 42 + x

        4 * initial_male = 5 * now_female
        4 * 70 = 5 * now_female
        280 = 5 * now_female

        now_female = 42 + x
        280 = 5 * (42 + x)
        280 = 5 * 42 + 5 * x
        5 * 42 = 210
        280 = 210 + 5 * x
        280 - 210 = 5 * x
        70 = 5 * x
        x = 70 / 5
        x = 14

        now_female = 42 + 14
        now_female = 56

title: Math23k_1823
description: Question:一堆货物，第一天运走了总数的(1/4)，第二天运走了总数的(2/5)还剩35吨．第一天运走多少吨？

        day2 = (2 / 5) * total
        remaining = total - (day1 + day2)
        =>:
            day1 = 25
    prove:
        day1 + day2 = (1 / 4) * total + (2 / 5) * total
        (1 / 4) = 5 / 20
        (2 / 5) = 8 / 20
        day1 + day2 = (5 / 20 + 8 / 20) * total = (13 / 20) * total
        remaining = total - (13 / 20) * total = (7 / 20) * total

        day1 = (1 / 4) * 100 = 25

title: Math23k_22281
description: Question:一列火车32小时共行驶2481千米，已知这列火车先以每小时75千米的速度行驶了11小时，又以80千米的速度行驶了9小时，求其余时间的行驶速度．
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_distance, total_time, speed1, time1, speed2, time2, remaining_distance, remaining_time, remaining_speed R:
        total_distance = 2481
        total_time = 32
        speed1 = 75
        time1 = 11
        speed2 = 80
        time2 = 9
        remaining_distance = total_distance - (speed1 * time1 + speed2 * time2)
        remaining_time = total_time - (time1 + time2)
        remaining_speed = remaining_distance / remaining_time
        =>:
            remaining_speed = 78
    prove:
        speed1 * time1 = 75 * 11 = 825
        speed2 * time2 = 80 * 9 = 720
        speed1 * time1 + speed2 * time2 = 825 + 720 = 1545
        remaining_distance = 2481 - 1545 = 936
        remaining_time = 32 - (11 + 9) = 32 - 20 = 12
        remaining_speed = 936 / 12 = 78

title: Math23k_14599

title: Math23k_16297
description: Question:一次数学竞赛，测试题只有两道，结果全班只有17人全对，做对第二道题的有26人，做错第一道题的共33人，两题都错的有多少人．
full litex:
claim:
    forall n, A, Ac, B, AandB, AunionB, x N_pos:
        Ac = 33
        B = 26
        AandB = 17
        A = n - Ac
        AunionB = A + B - AandB
        n = AunionB + x
        =>:
            x = 24
    prove:
        A = n - 33
        AunionB = A + 26 - 17
        =:
            A + 26 - 17
            A + 9
        AunionB = A + 9
        AunionB = (n - 33) + 9
        =:
            (n - 33) + 9
            n - 24
        AunionB = n - 24
        n = (n - 24) + x
        n - n = ((n - 24) + x) - n
        =:
            n - n
            0
        0 = ((n - 24) + x) - n
        =:
            ((n - 24) + x) - n
            x - 24
        0 = x - 24
        0 + 24 = (x - 24) + 24
        =:
            0 + 24
            24
        =:
            (x - 24) + 24
            x
        =:
            24
            x
        x = 24

title: Math23k_19249
description: Question:一个比的前项是(1/2)比值是(2/5)，这个比的后项=．
full litex:
know @ratio_cross_multiply(a, x, num, den R):
    x != 0
    den != 0
    a / x = num / den
    =>:
        a * den = num * x

claim:
    forall a, x, num, den R:
        a = 1/2
        num = 2
        den = 5
        x != 0
        den != 0
        a / x = num / den
        =>:
            x = 5/4
    prove:
        $ratio_cross_multiply(a, x, num, den)
        a * den = num * x
        1/2 * 5 = 2 * x
        5/2 = 2 * x
        (5/2) / 2 = (2 * x) / 2
        (5/2) / 2 = x
        5/4 = x
        x = 5/4

description: Question:甲乙两地相距450千米，一辆汽车从甲地开往乙地，平均每小时行65千米，4小时后还剩多少千米．
full litex:
claim:
    forall distance_total, speed, time, distance_remaining R:
        distance_total = 450
        speed = 65
        time = 4
        distance_remaining = distance_total - speed * time
        =>:
            distance_remaining = 190
    prove:
        speed * time = 65 * 4 = 260
        distance_remaining = 450 - 260 = 190

title: Math23k_7649
description: Question:一个因数是35，另一个因数是62，积=．
full litex:
claim:
    forall factor1, factor2, product R:
        factor1 = 35
        factor2 = 62
        product = factor1 * factor2
        =>:
            product = 2170
    prove:
        factor1 = 35
        factor2 = 62
        product = 35 * (60 + 2) = 35 * 60 + 35 * 2
        35 * 60 = 2100
        35 * 2 = 70
        product = 2100 + 70 = 2170

title: Math23k_16868

title: Math23k_2126

title: Math23k_18227

title: Math23k_15996

title: Math23k_876
description: Question:小刚和小明进行100米短跑比赛（假定二人的速度均不变）．当小刚跑了90米时，小明距终点还有25米，那么，当小刚到达终点时，小明距离终点还有多少米．

title: Math23k_10546
description: Question:修路队修一条路，5天修了这条路的(2/9)，照这样的速度，修完这条路还需要多少天？
full litex:
claim:
    forall days_initial, fraction_done, fraction_left, rate_daily, days_remaining R:
        days_initial = 5
        fraction_done = 2 / 9
        rate_daily = fraction_done / days_initial
        fraction_left = 1 - fraction_done
        days_remaining = fraction_left / rate_daily
        =>:
            days_remaining = 17.5
    prove:
        rate_daily = (2 / 9) / 5 = 2 / 45
        fraction_left = 1 - 2 / 9 = 7 / 9
        days_remaining = (7 / 9) / (2 / 45) = (7 / 9) * (45 / 2) = 17.5

title: Math23k_17893
description: Question:一辆汽车的速度是65千米/时，它从甲地出发到400千米处的乙地，上午已经行了140千米，下午还要行几小时才能到达？

    forall total_distance, speed, morning_distance, total_time, morning_time, afternoon_time R:
        total_distance = 400
        speed = 65
        morning_distance = 140
        total_time = total_distance / speed
        morning_time = morning_distance / speed
        afternoon_time = total_time - morning_time
        =>:
            afternoon_time = 4
    prove:
        total_time = 400 / 65
        morning_time = 140 / 65
        afternoon_time = (400 / 65) - (140 / 65)

        afternoon_time = 260 / 65
        afternoon_time = 4

title: Math23k_16833
description: Question:客车从甲地开往乙地，货车从乙地开往甲地，两车同时相向开出，12小时相遇．相遇后，客车又行了8小时到达乙地．相遇后，货车再行几小时到达甲地？
full litex:
know @pos_implies_nonzero(x R):
    x > 0
    =>:
        x != 0

claim:
    forall v1, v2, D, t, remaining R:
        v1 > 0
        v2 > 0
        12 * v1 + 12 * v2 = D
        8 * v1 = D - 12 * v1
        remaining = D - 12 * v2
        t = remaining / v2
        =>:
            t = 18
    prove:
        8 * v1 + 12 * v1 = D
        20 * v1 = D
        D = 20 * v1

        12 * v1 + 12 * v2 = D
        12 * v1 + 12 * v2 = 20 * v1
        12 * v2 = 20 * v1 - 12 * v1
        12 * v2 = 8 * v1
        v2 = (8 * v1) / 12
        v2 = (2 * v1) / 3

        remaining = D - 12 * v2
        remaining = 20 * v1 - 12 * ((2 * v1) / 3)
        12 * ((2 * v1) / 3) = 8 * v1
        remaining = 20 * v1 - 8 * v1
        remaining = 12 * v1

        $pos_implies_nonzero(v2)
        =:
            t
            remaining / v2
            (12 * v1) / ((2 * v1) / 3)
            12 / (2/3)
            12 * (3/2)
            18

title: Math23k_4406
description: Question:某工厂生产一批零件，经检验已有84个不合格，至少要有多少个合格，才能确保合格率达到98%．
full litex:
know @pass_rate_exact(good N_pos, total N_pos, pass_ratio R):
    total = good + 84
    pass_ratio = 49 / 50
    =>:
        50 * good = 49 * total

claim:
    forall good, total N_pos, pass_ratio R:
        total = good + 84
        pass_ratio = 49 / 50
        =>:
            good = 4116
    prove:
        total = good + 84
        pass_ratio = 49 / 50
        $pass_rate_exact(good, total, pass_ratio)
        50 * good = 49 * total
        50 * good = 49 * (good + 84)
        50 * good = 49 * good + 49 * 84
        50 * good - 49 * good = 49 * 84
        1 * good = 49 * 84
        1 * good = good
        =:
            49 * 84
            (50 - 1) * 84
            50 * 84 - 1 * 84
        50 * 84 = 4200
        1 * 84 = 84
        50 * 84 - 1 * 84 = 4200 - 84
        4200 - 84 = 4116
        49 * 84 = 4116
        good = 4116

        =>:

title: Math23k_5766
description: Question:一个数乘以9，除以6，再加上12，减去8，结果等于10，这个数=？
full litex:

    forall x, step1, step2, step3, step4 R:
        step1 = x * 9
        step2 = step1 / 6
        step3 = step2 + 12
        step4 = step3 - 8
        step4 = 10
        =>:
            x = 4
    prove:

        step2 = step3 - 12 = 18 - 12 = 6
        step1 = step2 * 6 = 6 * 6 = 36
        x = step1 / 9 = 36 / 9 = 4

title: Math23k_14645
description: Question:操场上有108名同学在锻炼身体，其中女生占(2/9)，后来又来了几名女生，使女生人数和男生人数的比是3：7，后来来了几名女生？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_initial, girls_initial, boys, x R:
        total_initial = 108
        girls_initial = total_initial * (2/9)
        boys = total_initial - girls_initial
        (girls_initial + x) / boys = 3/7
        =>:
            x = 12
    prove:
        girls_initial = 108 * (2/9) = 24
        boys = 108 - 24 = 84
        7 * (24 + x) = 3 * 84
        3 * 84 = 252
        7 * (24 + x) = 252
        7 * 24 + 7 * x = 252
        168 + 7 * x = 252
        7 * x = 252 - 168
        7 * x = 84
        x = 84 / 7
        x = 12

title: Math23k_17081
description: Question:仓库里有一批玩具，运出这批玩具数量的(3/7)后，又运进20万件，这时仓库里的玩具比原来还多5万件．仓库原来有玩具多少万件？
full litex:
know @add_both_sides(u, v, t R):
    u = v
    =>:
        u + t = v + t

know @solve_add_left(a, b, c R):
    a + b = c
    =>:
        b = c - a

know @mul_both_sides(u, v, t R):
    u = v
    =>:
        u * t = v * t

claim:
    forall x, remaining, after_in R:
        remaining = x - (3/7) * x
        remaining = (4/7) * x
        after_in = remaining + 20
        after_in = x + 5
        =>:
            x = 35
    prove:
        after_in = remaining + 20
        remaining = (4/7) * x
        after_in = ((4/7) * x) + 20

        after_in = x + 5
        ((4/7) * x) + 20 = x + 5

        $add_both_sides(((4/7) * x) + 20, x + 5, -5)
        (((4/7) * x) + 20) + (-5) = (x + 5) + (-5)

        =:
            (((4/7) * x) + 20) + (-5)
            ((4/7) * x) + 15
        =:
            (x + 5) + (-5)
            x

        ((4/7) * x) + 15 = x

        $solve_add_left(((4/7) * x), 15, x)
        15 = x - ((4/7) * x)

        =:
            x - ((4/7) * x)
            (3/7) * x

        $mul_both_sides(15, (3/7) * x, (7/3))
        15 * (7/3) = ((3/7) * x) * (7/3)

        =:
            ((3/7) * x) * (7/3)
            ((3/7) * (7/3)) * x
            1 * x
            x

        15 * (7/3) = x
        =:
            15 * (7/3)
            35
        35 = x
        x = 35

description: Question:一天某生产小组前3小时共生产零件510个，后5个小时每小时生产零件186个，这一天平均每小时生产零件多少个？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_parts, avg_parts, first_hours, second_hours, first_production, second_production R:
        first_hours = 3
        second_hours = 5
        first_production = 510
        second_production = 186 * second_hours
        total_parts = first_production + second_production
        avg_parts = total_parts / (first_hours + second_hours)
        =>:
            avg_parts = 180
    prove:
        second_production = 186 * 5 = 930
        total_parts = 510 + 930 = 1440
        avg_parts = 1440 / (3 + 5) = 1440 / 8 = 180

title: Math23k_8051
description: Question:小华家到学校有上坡路和小坡路，没有平路，共2.4千米．小华每天上学要走1.1小时．已知小华上坡时每小时走2千米，下坡时每小时走3千米．那么小华放学回家要走多少小时．
full litex:
claim:
    forall x, y, total_distance, t_school, up_speed, down_speed, time_back R:
        total_distance = 2.4
        t_school = 1.1
        up_speed = 2
        down_speed = 3
        x + y = total_distance
        x / up_speed + y / down_speed = t_school
        time_back = y / up_speed + x / down_speed
        =>:
            time_back = 0.9
    prove:
        y = total_distance - x
        =:
            6 * (x / up_speed + y / down_speed)
            6 * t_school
            3 * x + 2 * y
            6.6
        3 * x + 2 * y = 6.6
        3 * x + 2 * (2.4 - x) = 6.6
        3 * x + 4.8 - 2 * x = 6.6
        x + 4.8 = 6.6
        x = 6.6 - 4.8
        x = 1.8
        y = 2.4 - 1.8
        y = 0.6
        time_back = y / up_speed + x / down_speed
        time_back = 0.6 / 2 + 1.8 / 3
        time_back = 0.3 + 0.6
        time_back = 0.9

title: Math23k_16650
description: Question:修一条路，甲队每天修6小时，4天可以完成；乙队每天修8小时，5天可以完成．现在让甲、乙两队合修，要求2天完成，每天应修多少小时．
full litex:
claim:
    forall hours_per_day_teamA, days_teamA, hours_per_day_teamB, days_teamB, total_hours_teamA, total_hours_teamB, efficiency_teamA, efficiency_teamB, combined_efficiency, required_hours_per_day R:
        hours_per_day_teamA = 6
        days_teamA = 4
        hours_per_day_teamB = 8
        days_teamB = 5
        total_hours_teamA = hours_per_day_teamA * days_teamA
        total_hours_teamB = hours_per_day_teamB * days_teamB
        efficiency_teamA = 1 / total_hours_teamA
        efficiency_teamB = 1 / total_hours_teamB
        combined_efficiency = efficiency_teamA + efficiency_teamB
        required_hours_per_day = (1 / 2) / combined_efficiency
        =>:
            required_hours_per_day = 7.5
    prove:
        total_hours_teamA = 6 * 4 = 24
        total_hours_teamB = 8 * 5 = 40
        efficiency_teamA = 1 / 24
        efficiency_teamB = 1 / 40
        combined_efficiency = 1 / 24 + 1 / 40 = 5 / 120 + 3 / 120 = 8 / 120 = 1 / 15
        required_hours_per_day = (1 / 2) / (1 / 15) = (1 / 2) * 15 = 7.5

title: Math23k_15440
description: Question:一个空油桶装进40%的油以后，连桶共重8.5干克，当这个油桶装满油以后，连桶共重16干克，这时要使油桶中剩下80%的油，需要从桶中倒出多少千克油．
full litex:
claim:
    forall w, o, remaining_oil, oil_to_remove R:
        w + o = 16
        w + 0.4 * o = 8.5
        remaining_oil = 0.8 * o
        oil_to_remove = o - remaining_oil
        =>:
            oil_to_remove = 2.5
    prove:
        w = 16 - o
        16 - o + 0.4 * o = 8.5
        16 - 0.6 * o = 8.5
        0.6 * o = 16 - 8.5 = 7.5
        o = 7.5 / 0.6 = 12.5
        w = 16 - 12.5 = 3.5
        remaining_oil = 0.8 * 12.5 = 10
        oil_to_remove = 12.5 - 10 = 2.5

title: Math23k_17451
description: Question:李明看一本书故事书，第一天看了(1/3)，第二天看了全书的(2/5)，还剩24页没有看，这本书共有多少页？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_pages, day1_fraction, day2_fraction, remaining_pages R:
        day1_fraction = 1 / 3
        day2_fraction = 2 / 5
        remaining_pages = 24
        total_pages = (day1_fraction + day2_fraction) * total_pages + remaining_pages
        =>:
            total_pages = 90
    prove:
        day1_fraction = 1 / 3 = 5 / 15
        day2_fraction = 2 / 5 = 6 / 15
        total_pages = (5 / 15 + 6 / 15) * total_pages + 24
        total_pages = (11 / 15) * total_pages + 24
        24 = total_pages - (11 / 15) * total_pages
        24 = (4 / 15) * total_pages
        total_pages = 24 * (15 / 4) = 90

        bucket_weight + (3 / 8) * oil_weight = weight_remaining
        =>:
            oil_weight = 48
    prove:
        bucket_weight = 54 - oil_weight
        bucket_weight + (3 / 8) * oil_weight = 24
        (54 - oil_weight) + (3 / 8) * oil_weight = 24
        54 - oil_weight + (3 / 8) * oil_weight = 24
        54 - (5 / 8) * oil_weight = 24
        54 - 24 = (5 / 8) * oil_weight
        30 = (5 / 8) * oil_weight
        oil_weight = 30 * (8 / 5) = 48

        male = (4/5) * female
        total = female + male
        not total = 0
        ratio = male / total
        =>:
            ratio = 4/9
    prove:
        total = female + male
        total = female + (4/5) * female

title: Math23k_15409
description: Question:一堆糖果共200块，其中奶糖占这堆糖果的40%，再加入多少块奶糖后，奶糖占现有糖果60%．
full litex:
know @equal_subtract_same(a, b, c R):
    a = b
    =>:
        a - c = b - c

know @solve_linear_equation(a, b, x R):
    a != 0
    a * x + b = 0
    =>:
        x = -b / a

claim:
    forall total0, milk_ratio0, milk0, add, total1, milk1, ratio1 R:
        total0 = 200
        milk_ratio0 = 0.4
        ratio1 = 0.6
        milk0 = total0 * milk_ratio0
        total1 = total0 + add
        milk1 = milk0 + add
        milk1 = ratio1 * total1
        =>:
            add = 100
    prove:
        milk0 = 200 * 0.4
        milk0 = 80

        total1 = 200 + add
        milk1 = 80 + add

        80 + add = 0.6 * (200 + add)
        0.6 * (200 + add) = 0.6 * 200 + 0.6 * add
        0.6 * 200 = 120
        0.6 * (200 + add) = 120 + 0.6 * add
        80 + add = 120 + 0.6 * add

        $equal_subtract_same(80 + add, 120 + 0.6 * add, 0.6 * add)
        80 + add - 0.6 * add = 120 + 0.6 * add - 0.6 * add
        120 + 0.6 * add - 0.6 * add = 120
        80 + add - 0.6 * add = 120

        $equal_subtract_same(80 + add - 0.6 * add, 120, 80)
        80 + add - 0.6 * add - 80 = 120 - 80
        120 - 80 = 40
        80 + add - 0.6 * add - 80 = 40
        =:
            80 + add - 0.6 * add - 80
            add - 0.6 * add
        add - 0.6 * add = 40

        =:
            add - 0.6 * add
            (1 - 0.6) * add
            0.4 * add
        0.4 * add = 40

        $equal_subtract_same(0.4 * add, 40, 40)
        0.4 * add - 40 = 40 - 40
        40 - 40 = 0
        0.4 * add - 40 = 0

        $solve_linear_equation(0.4, -40, add)
        add = -(-40) / 0.4
        =:
            -(-40)
            40
        add = 40 / 0.4
        add = 100

title: Math23k_15968
description: Question:兴趣小组有女生10人，男生12人，还要录取女生多少人才能使女生占舞蹈队总人数的(3/5)．
full litex:
know @cross_multiply_pos(a, b, c, d R):
    b > 0
    d > 0
    a / b = c / d
    =>:
        a * d = c * b

know @subtract_both_sides(a, b, t R):
    a = b
    =>:
        a - t = b - t

know @divide_both_sides_nonzero(a, b, t R):
    t != 0
    a * t = b
    =>:
        a = b / t

claim:
    forall girls_now, boys_now, x, girls_new, total, ratio R:
        girls_now = 10
        boys_now = 12
        girls_new = girls_now + x
        total = girls_new + boys_now
        ratio = girls_new / total
        ratio = 3 / 5
        total > 0
        5 > 0
        2 != 0
        =>:
            x = 8
    prove:
        $cross_multiply_pos(girls_new, total, 3, 5)
        girls_new * 5 = 3 * total
        =:
            girls_new * 5
            5 * girls_new
        girls_new = girls_now + x
        girls_now = 10
        =:
            5 * girls_new
            5 * (10 + x)
            50 + 5 * x
        total = girls_new + boys_now
        boys_now = 12
        total = (10 + x) + 12
        total = 22 + x
        =:
            3 * total
            3 * (22 + x)
            66 + 3 * x
        50 + 5 * x = 66 + 3 * x
        $subtract_both_sides(50 + 5 * x, 66 + 3 * x, 3 * x)
        (50 + 5 * x) - 3 * x = (66 + 3 * x) - 3 * x
        =:
            (50 + 5 * x) - 3 * x
            50 + 2 * x
        =:
            (66 + 3 * x) - 3 * x
            66
        50 + 2 * x = 66
        $subtract_both_sides(50 + 2 * x, 66, 50)
        (50 + 2 * x) - 50 = 66 - 50
        =:
            (50 + 2 * x) - 50
            2 * x
        66 - 50 = 16
        2 * x = 16
        $divide_both_sides_nonzero(x, 16, 2)
        x = 16 / 2
        x = 8

full litex:

        track = x * (1 / 3)
        field = x * (1 / 6)
        group = x - track - field
        =>:
            group = x * (1 / 2)
    prove:
        track = x * (1 / 3)
        field = x * (1 / 6)
        group = x - x * (1 / 3) - x * (1 / 6)
        group = x * (1 - (1 / 3) - (1 / 6))

        group = x * (3 / 6)
        group = x * (1 / 2)

full litex:
claim:
    forall total_distance, interval, obstacle_count R:
        total_distance = 1000
        interval = 50
        obstacle_count = total_distance / interval + 1
        =>:
            obstacle_count = 21
    prove:
        obstacle_count = 1000 / 50 + 1 = 20 + 1 = 21

title: Math23k_22736
description: Question:一副羽毛拍76元，一个羽毛球3元钱，王老师拿出100元钱买了一副羽毛拍，剩下的钱还能买几个羽毛球？

claim:
    forall total_money, racket_price, ball_price, remaining_money, balls R:
        total_money = 100
        racket_price = 76
        ball_price = 3
        remaining_money = total_money - racket_price
        balls = remaining_money / ball_price
        =>:
            balls = 8
    prove:
        remaining_money = 100 - 76 = 24
        balls = 24 / 3 = 8

title: Math23k_19334
description: Question:新华书店新到一批儿童读物，第一天卖出总数的(3/8)，第二天卖出总数的40%，还余下450本，这一批儿童读物一共有多少本？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total, remaining R:
        total - ((3 / 8) * total + 0.4 * total) = remaining
        remaining = 450
        =>:
            total = 2000
    prove:
        (3 / 8) * total = (15 / 40) * total
        0.4 * total = (16 / 40) * total
        (3 / 8) * total + 0.4 * total = (15 / 40) * total + (16 / 40) * total = (31 / 40) * total
        total - (31 / 40) * total = 450
        total * (1 - 31 / 40) = 450
        total * (9 / 40) = 450
        total = 450 / (9 / 40)
        total = 450 * (40 / 9)
        total = 2000

title: Math23k_10313
description: Question:一段木料锯了3次，一共用了6分钟，像这样如果要锯成5段，那么要用多少分钟．

        cuts_done = 3
        time_done = 6
        segments_wanted = 5
        time_per_cut = time_done / cuts_done
        cuts_needed = segments_wanted - 1
        time_total = cuts_needed * time_per_cut
        =>:
            time_total = 8

title: Math23k_20392
description: Question:一头海象体重大约是1.13吨，北极熊的体重比海象轻0.48吨，白鲸比一只北极熊重0.5吨，一头白鲸重多少吨？

        people_1st = 2 * people_6th - 80

title: Math23k_9197
description: Question:服装厂计划4月份生产西服1500件，结果上半月便完成了65%，照这样计算，全月超过计划产量多少件？

title: Math23k_7017
description: Question:王华看一本240页的书，第一天看了全书的(1/6)，第二天看了全书的25%，还剩多少页没有看？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_pages, day1_fraction, day2_fraction, pages_read, pages_left R:
        total_pages = 240
        day1_fraction = 1 / 6
        day2_fraction = 1 / 4
        pages_read = total_pages * (day1_fraction + day2_fraction)
        pages_left = total_pages - pages_read
        =>:
            pages_left = 140
    prove:
        day1_fraction = 1 / 6 = 2 / 12
        day2_fraction = 1 / 4 = 3 / 12
        day1_fraction + day2_fraction = 2 / 12 + 3 / 12 = 5 / 12
        pages_read = 240 * (5 / 12) = 100
        pages_left = 240 - 100 = 140

title: Math23k_5088
description: Question:王强读一本故事书，已经读了80页，已读页数和未读页数的比是4：5．这本故事书有多少页？
full litex:
know @ratio_cross_multiply(n1, d1, n2, d2 R):
    d1 != 0
    d2 != 0
    n1 / d1 = n2 / d2
    =>:
        n1 * d2 = n2 * d1

claim:
    forall total, read, unread, a, b R:
        read = 80
        a = 4
        b = 5
        unread = total - read
        unread != 0
        b != 0
        read / unread = a / b
        =>:
            total = 180
    prove:
        $ratio_cross_multiply(read, unread, a, b)
        read * b = a * unread
        80 * 5 = 4 * unread
        unread = total - read
        read = 80
        total - read = total - 80
        unread = total - 80
        4 * unread = 4 * (total - 80)
        80 * 5 = 4 * (total - 80)
        80 * 5 = 400
        4 * (total - 80) = 4 * total - 4 * 80
        4 * 80 = 320
        400 = 4 * total - 320
        400 + 320 = 4 * total
        720 = 4 * total
        total = 720 / 4
        total = 180

title: Math23k_3483
description: Question:一桶油，第一次用去它的(1/6)，第二次用去它的(1/4)．如果第3次用去3千克正好用完，那么第一次用去多少千克？
full litex:
claim:
    forall x, first_use, second_use, third_use R:
        first_use = 1 / 6 * x
        second_use = 1 / 4 * x
        third_use = 3
        first_use + second_use + third_use = x
        =>:
            first_use = 6 / 7
    prove:
        first_use + second_use = (1 / 6) * x + (1 / 4) * x
        (1 / 6) * x + (1 / 4) * x = (2 / 12) * x + (3 / 12) * x = (5 / 12) * x
        (5 / 12) * x + 3 = x
        3 = x - (5 / 12) * x
        3 = (12 / 12) * x - (5 / 12) * x = (7 / 12) * x
        x = 3 * (12 / 7) = 36 / 7
        first_use = (1 / 6) * (36 / 7) = 36 / 42 = 6 / 7

title: Math23k_11539

        initial_mass = 200
        initial_concentration = 0.20

        final_concentration = 0.16
        total_mass = initial_mass + water
        sugar = final_concentration * total_mass
        =>:
            water = 50
    prove:

        40 = 0.16 * (200 + water)

        8 = 0.16 * water

title: Math23k_10616

title: Math23k_8608
description: Question:工程队修一条水渠，第一天修了全长的(1/3)，第二天修了30米，两天共修了全长的(1/2)，这条水渠全长多少米？
full litex:
claim:
    forall L, day1, day2, total, multiplier R:
        day1 = L / 3
        day2 = 30
        total = L / 2
        multiplier = 6
        day1 + day2 = total
        =>:
            L = 180
    prove:
        (L / 3) + 30 = total

        (L / 3) + 30 = L / 2

        multiplier * ((L / 3) + 30) = multiplier * (L / 2)

        (multiplier * (L / 3)) + (multiplier * 30) = multiplier * (L / 2)

        (6 * (L / 3)) + (6 * 30) = multiplier * (L / 2)

        (6 * (L / 3)) + (6 * 30) = 6 * (L / 2)

        (2 * L) + 180 = 6 * (L / 2)

        (2 * L) + 180 = 3 * L

        ((2 * L) + 180) - (2 * L) = (3 * L) - (2 * L)

        =:
            ((2 * L) + 180) - (2 * L)
            (2 * L) - (2 * L) + 180
            0 + 180
            180

        =:
            (3 * L) - (2 * L)
            (3 - 2) * L
            1 * L
            L

        180 = L

title: Math23k_2116
description: Question:化(32/7)为带分数=．

    forall numerator, denominator, quotient, remainder, mixed_int, frac_num, frac_den, mixed_sum R:
        numerator = 32

        remainder = 4
        mixed_int = quotient
        frac_den = denominator
        frac_num = remainder
        mixed_sum = mixed_int + frac_num / frac_den
        =>:
            numerator / denominator = mixed_sum
    prove:
        numerator = 32
        denominator = 7
        quotient = 4
        remainder = 4

        mixed_int = quotient
        mixed_int = 4

        frac_den = denominator
        frac_den = 7

        frac_num = remainder
        frac_num = 4

        mixed_sum = mixed_int + frac_num / frac_den
        =:
            mixed_sum
            4 + 4 / 7
            (4 * 7) / 7 + 4 / 7
            28 / 7 + 4 / 7
            (28 + 4) / 7
            32 / 7

        numerator / denominator = 32 / 7
        numerator / denominator = mixed_sum

title: Math23k_1860
description: Question:用10克糖配制成含糖率为20%的糖水，需加水多少克？

            5 * sugar

            5 * ((1/5) * total)
            (5 * (1/5)) * total
            1 * total
            total
            sugar + water
        =:
            5 * 10
            5 * sugar
            sugar + water
            10 + water
        =:
            50
            5 * 10
            10 + water

            0 + water
            water
        =:

full litex:
claim:
    forall a, b, difference R:
        a = 137
        b = 5 * a
        difference = b - a
        =>:
            difference = 548
    prove:
        b = 5 * 137 = 685
        difference = 685 - 137 = 548

title: Math23k_14237
description: Question:一列火车从甲地开往乙地，已经行了全程的(3/5)，距离乙地还有245千米，甲乙两地之间的距离=多少千米？

title: Math23k_11218
description: Question:一辆汽车从甲地开往乙地，前2小时共行120千米，后3小时平均每小时行55千米，这辆汽车平均每小时行多少千米？

claim:
    forall distance_first, distance_second, total_distance, total_time, average_speed R:
        distance_first = 120
        distance_second = 55 * 3
        total_distance = distance_first + distance_second
        total_time = 2 + 3
        average_speed = total_distance / total_time
        =>:
            average_speed = 57
    prove:
        distance_second = 55 * 3 = 165
        total_distance = 120 + 165 = 285
        total_time = 2 + 3 = 5
        average_speed = 285 / 5 = 57

title: Math23k_2552
description: Question:赵佳和李敏的画片张数的比是4：5．如果赵佳有32张画片，李敏有多少张画片．
full litex:

        ratio_zhao = 4
        ratio_li = 5

        =>:

title: Math23k_20303
description: Question:甲乙两队学生从相隔18千米的两地同时出发，相向而行，一名学生骑自行车以每小时14千米的速度在两队间不停的往返联络，甲对每小时行5千米，乙对每小时行4千米，两队相遇时，骑自行车的学生共行多少米？
full litex:
claim:
    forall distance, speed_a, speed_b, speed_bike, time, distance_bike_km, distance_bike_m R:
        distance = 18
        speed_a = 5
        speed_b = 4
        speed_bike = 14
        time = distance / (speed_a + speed_b)
        distance_bike_km = speed_bike * time
        distance_bike_m = distance_bike_km * 1000
        =>:
            distance_bike_m = 28000
    prove:
        time = 18 / (5 + 4) = 18 / 9 = 2
        distance_bike_km = 14 * 2 = 28
        distance_bike_m = 28 * 1000 = 28000

title: Math23k_8537
description: Question:(8/9)千克大豆可以榨油(1/3)千克，1千克大豆能榨油多少千克．
full litex:
claim:
    forall soy_weight, oil_weight, ratio R:
        soy_weight = 8 / 9
        oil_weight = 1 / 3
        ratio = oil_weight / soy_weight
        =>:
            ratio = 3 / 8
    prove:
        ratio = (1 / 3) / (8 / 9)
        ratio = (1 / 3) * (9 / 8)
        ratio = (1 * 9) / (3 * 8)
        ratio = 9 / 24
        ratio = 3 / 8

title: Math23k_5388
description: Question:某作家从出版社领取稿费5800元．按规定，稿费如果超过800元，超出部分按14%缴纳个人所得税，这位作家实得稿费多少元？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total, threshold, excess, tax_rate, tax, actual R:
        total = 5800
        threshold = 800
        tax_rate = 0.14
        excess = total - threshold
        tax = excess * tax_rate
        actual = total - tax
        =>:
            actual = 5100
    prove:
        excess = 5800 - 800 = 5000
        tax = 5000 * 0.14 = 700
        actual = 5800 - 700 = 5100

title: Math23k_5000

title: Math23k_8940
description: Question:工程队要修建一条长126km的公路．甲、乙两小队从两端同时相向修建，14天修好这条路，甲队每天修4km．乙队每天修多少千米？

title: Math23k_8503
description: Question:甲乙两城相距2590千米．两架飞机同时从两城相对飞出，经过2小时相遇，一架飞机每小时飞行650千米，另一架每小时飞行多少千米？

description: Question:杨师傅3小时生产零件225个，技术革新后，2小时生产180个，生产效率提高了百分之几？
full litex:

        old_production = 225
        old_time = 3
        new_production = 180
        new_time = 2
        old_efficiency = old_production / old_time
        new_efficiency = new_production / new_time

title: Math23k_15439

title: Math23k_9679
description: Question:龙博士开车到“彩色城”购买玩具，因途中一路段正在抢修而将车速降低了(1/5)．那么，龙博士在路上的时间增加了多少？
full litex:
know @pos_not_zero(x R):
    x > 0
    =>:
        not x = 0
know @pos_mul(x, y R):
    x > 0
    y > 0
    =>:
        x * y > 0
know @pos_div(x, y R):
    x > 0
    y > 0
    =>:
        x / y > 0
know @ratio_minus_one(x, y R):
    not y = 0
    =>:
        (x - y) / y = x / y - 1
know @ratio_same_numerator(a, b, c R):
    not b = 0
    not c = 0
    =>:
        (a / b) / (a / c) = c / b
know @cancel_common_factor(x, k R):
    x > 0
    k > 0
    =>:
        x / (k * x) = 1 / k

claim:
    forall v, d, t, v_new, t_new, increase_ratio, ratio_tt R:
        v > 0
        d > 0
        t = d / v
        v_new = v - v / 5
        t_new = d / v_new
        increase_ratio = (t_new - t) / t
        ratio_tt = t_new / t
        =>:
            increase_ratio = 1/4
    prove:
        $pos_not_zero(v)

        v_new = v - v / 5
        v_new = v * (1 - 1/5)
        v_new = v * (4/5)
        v_new = (4/5) * v

        4/5 > 0
        $pos_mul(4/5, v)
        ((4/5) * v) > 0
        v_new > 0
        $pos_not_zero(v_new)

        t = d / v
        t_new = d / v_new

        $pos_div(d, v)
        (d / v) > 0
        t > 0
        $pos_not_zero(t)

        increase_ratio = (t_new - t) / t
        $ratio_minus_one(t_new, t)
        increase_ratio = t_new / t - 1

        ratio_tt = t_new / t
        ratio_tt = (d / v_new) / (d / v)
        $ratio_same_numerator(d, v_new, v)
        ratio_tt = v / v_new
        ratio_tt = v / ((4/5) * v)
        $cancel_common_factor(v, 4/5)
        v / ((4/5) * v) = 1 / (4/5)
        ratio_tt = 1 / (4/5)
        ratio_tt = 5/4

        increase_ratio = ratio_tt - 1
        increase_ratio = 5/4 - 1
        increase_ratio = 1/4

title: Math23k_15404
description: Question:商店购进苹果、梨共54千克，苹果占(2/9)．后来又买进一些苹果，这时苹果占两种水果总重量的40%，后来买进的苹果=多少千克？
full litex:
know @div_to_mul(a, b, c R):
    a / b = c
    =>:
        a = b * c

claim:
    forall total_initial, apple_ratio, apple_initial, x, total_after, apple_after, ratio_after R:
        total_initial = 54
        apple_ratio = 2/9
        apple_initial = total_initial * apple_ratio
        ratio_after = 0.4
        total_after = total_initial + x
        apple_after = apple_initial + x
        apple_after / total_after = ratio_after
        =>:
            x = 16
    prove:
        apple_initial = 54 * (2/9)
        apple_initial = 12

        total_after = 54 + x
        apple_after = 12 + x

        $div_to_mul(apple_after, total_after, ratio_after)
        apple_after = total_after * ratio_after

        12 + x = (54 + x) * 0.4
        12 + x = 0.4 * (54 + x)
        12 + x = 0.4 * 54 + 0.4 * x
        0.4 * 54 = 21.6
        12 + x = 21.6 + 0.4 * x

        12 + x - 0.4 * x = 21.6
        x - 0.4 * x = 0.6 * x
        12 + 0.6 * x = 21.6

        0.6 * x = 21.6 - 12
        21.6 - 12 = 9.6
        0.6 * x = 9.6

        (0.6 * x) / 0.6 = 9.6 / 0.6
        x = 9.6 / 0.6
        x = 16

title: Math23k_16953
description: Question:一根绳子剪去20%后又接上5米，结果比原来短(3/20)，现在绳子长多少米？（不计接头）

claim:
    forall original, after_cut, after_add, short_ratio R:
        short_ratio = 3/20
        after_cut = original * (1 - 0.2)
        after_add = after_cut + 5
        after_add = original * (1 - short_ratio)
        =>:
            after_add = 85
    prove:
        after_add = original * (1 - 3/20) = original * 17/20
        after_add = 0.8 * original + 5
        0.8 * original + 5 = 17/20 * original
        0.8 * original - 17/20 * original = -5

title: Math23k_19983
description: Question:春季运动会上，六年级少先队为同学们准备了10千克糖水，其中糖和水的比是1：26，因天气炎热需加量，先补充了52千克水．再加多少千克糖，才能保持原来的浓度？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total0, sugar_ratio, water_ratio, ratio_sum, sugar0, add_water, total_after_water, add_sugar, new_total R:
        total0 = 10
        sugar_ratio = 1
        water_ratio = 26
        ratio_sum = sugar_ratio + water_ratio
        sugar0 = total0 / ratio_sum
        add_water = 52
        total_after_water = total0 + add_water
        new_total = total_after_water + add_sugar
        27 * (sugar0 + add_sugar) = new_total
        =>:
            add_sugar = 2
    prove:
        ratio_sum = 1 + 26
        ratio_sum = 27

        sugar0 = 10 / 27

        total_after_water = 10 + 52
        total_after_water = 62

        new_total = 62 + add_sugar

        27 * (sugar0 + add_sugar) = new_total
        27 * (10 / 27 + add_sugar) = 62 + add_sugar

        =:
            27 * (10 / 27 + add_sugar)
            27 * (10 / 27) + 27 * add_sugar
        27 * (10 / 27) + 27 * add_sugar = 62 + add_sugar

        =:
            27 * (10 / 27)
            10
        10 + 27 * add_sugar = 62 + add_sugar

        (10 + 27 * add_sugar) - add_sugar = (62 + add_sugar) - add_sugar

        =:
            (10 + 27 * add_sugar) - add_sugar
            10 + (27 * add_sugar - add_sugar)
        10 + (27 * add_sugar - add_sugar) = (62 + add_sugar) - add_sugar

        =:
            (27 * add_sugar - add_sugar)
            26 * add_sugar
        10 + 26 * add_sugar = (62 + add_sugar) - add_sugar

        =:
            (62 + add_sugar) - add_sugar
            62 + (add_sugar - add_sugar)
        10 + 26 * add_sugar = 62 + (add_sugar - add_sugar)

        =:
            add_sugar - add_sugar
            0
        10 + 26 * add_sugar = 62

        (10 + 26 * add_sugar) - 10 = 62 - 10

        =:
            (10 + 26 * add_sugar) - 10
            26 * add_sugar
        26 * add_sugar = 62 - 10

        =:
            62 - 10
            52
        26 * add_sugar = 52

        (26 * add_sugar) / 26 = 52 / 26

        =:
            (26 * add_sugar) / 26
            add_sugar
        add_sugar = 52 / 26

        =:
            52 / 26
            2
        add_sugar = 2

title: Math23k_20001
description: Question:甲乙两地相距2006千米，客车和货车同时从两地相对开出，相向而行，12小时后两车还相距200千米，已知货车每小时行60千米，则客车每小时行多少千米．

        time = 12

        distance_bus = v_bus * time
        covered = distance_truck + distance_bus
        =>:

title: Math23k_16878
description: Question:车站有一批货物，第一天运走全部货物的(1/3)多20吨，第二天运走全部货物的(1/2)少25吨，这时车站还存货物37吨，这批货物一共有多少吨？

        remaining = 37

    prove:

        day2 = (1 / 2) * total_goods - 25
        total_goods - ((1 / 3) * total_goods + 20) - ((1 / 2) * total_goods - 25) = 37
        total_goods - (1 / 3) * total_goods - 20 - (1 / 2) * total_goods + 25 = 37

        total_goods - (5 / 6) * total_goods + 5 = 37

        (1 / 6) * total_goods + 5 = 37

        total_goods = 32 * 6
        total_goods = 192

title: Math23k_13991
description: Question:用3个鹅蛋能换9个鸡蛋，2个鸡蛋能换4个鸽子蛋，用8个鹅蛋能换多少个鸽子蛋．
full litex:
claim:
    forall goose_eggs, chicken_eggs, pigeon_eggs R:
        goose_eggs = 8
        chicken_eggs = goose_eggs * (9 / 3)
        pigeon_eggs = chicken_eggs * (4 / 2)
        =>:
            pigeon_eggs = 48
    prove:
        chicken_eggs = 8 * (9 / 3) = 8 * 3 = 24
        pigeon_eggs = 24 * (4 / 2) = 24 * 2 = 48

title: Math23k_669
description: Question:盒子里有红、白两种球，其中红球有20个，占总数的(2/5)，那么白球有多少个．
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_balls, red_balls, white_balls R:
        red_balls = 20
        red_balls = 2 / 5 * total_balls
        white_balls = total_balls - red_balls
        =>:
            white_balls = 30
    prove:
        total_balls = 20 / (2 / 5) = 20 * (5 / 2) = 50
        white_balls = 50 - 20 = 30

title: Math23k_5629
description: Question:从9.6里连续减去多少个0.24，结果是0．
full litex:
claim:
    forall total, step, x R:
        total = 9.6
        step = 0.24
        total - step * x = 0
        =>:
            x = 40
    prove:
        =:
            total
            total - step * x + step * x
            0 + step * x
            step * x
        step * x = total

        =:
            x
            (step * x) / step
            total / step
        x = total / step

        x = 9.6 / 0.24
        x = (9.6 * 100) / (0.24 * 100)
        x = 960 / 24
        x = 40

title: Math23k_3514
description: Question:三角形的面积是6.2cm^2，高是3.1米厘米，底=多少厘米．
full litex:
claim:
    forall area, height, base R:
        area = 6.2
        height = 3.1
        area = 0.5 * base * height
        =>:
            base = 4
    prove:
        6.2 = 0.5 * base * 3.1
        6.2 * 2 = base * 3.1
        12.4 = base * 3.1
        base = 12.4 / 3.1 = 4

title: Math23k_17603
description: Question:把一个长、宽、高分别是5cm、4cm、3cm的长方体切成两个完全一样的长方体后，表面积最多增加多少cm^2．
full litex:
claim:
    forall original_area, new_area, increase R:
        original_area = 2 * (5 * 4 + 5 * 3 + 4 * 3)
        new_area = 2 * 2 * (5 * 4 + 5 * 1.5 + 4 * 1.5)
        increase = new_area - original_area
        =>:
            increase = 40
    prove:
        original_area = 2 * (20 + 15 + 12) = 2 * 47 = 94
        new_area = 2 * 2 * (20 + 7.5 + 6) = 2 * 2 * 33.5 = 134
        increase = 134 - 94 = 40

title: Math23k_3367
description: Question:把4.3米厂的竹竿插入水中，测量水池的深度，入泥部分是0.3米，露出水面1.1米，水池蓄水深度=多少米？

        total_length = 4.3
        mud_part = 0.3
        exposed_part = 1.1
        water_depth = total_length - mud_part - exposed_part
        =>:
            water_depth = 2.9

title: Math23k_2866
description: Question:服装厂3月份计划加工5400件衣服，结果上半月完成了(3/4)，下半月完成了(2/3)，这个月比原计划多加工多少件？

title: Math23k_11567
description: Question:A．B两桶油，A桶油重15千克，如果倒8千克给B桶，则B就是A的4倍，B桶原来有油多少千克？
full litex:
claim:
    forall oil_A_initial, oil_B_initial, oil_A_after, oil_B_after R:
        oil_A_initial = 15
        oil_A_after = oil_A_initial - 8
        oil_B_after = oil_B_initial + 8
        oil_B_after = 4 * oil_A_after
        =>:
            oil_B_initial = 20
    prove:
        oil_A_after = 15 - 8 = 7
        oil_B_after = oil_B_initial + 8
        oil_B_after = 4 * 7 = 28
        oil_B_initial = 28 - 8 = 20

title: Math23k_9328
description: Question:一辆汽车从A地去B地，去时下坡多，平均每小时行驶80千米，用了6小时；返回时，上坡多，用了8小时才到达，返回时平均每小时行驶多少千米？

        speed_go = 80
        time_go = 6
        time_return = 8
        distance = speed_go * time_go
        speed_return = distance / time_return
        =>:
            speed_return = 60

        speed_return = 480 / 8 = 60

title: Math23k_9388
description: Question:建筑工人把水泥、沙子、石子按2：3：5的比例配制一种混凝土．配制8000千克这种混凝土，需要水泥多少千克？

        ratio_sand = 3
        ratio_stone = 5
        total_ratio = ratio_cement + ratio_sand + ratio_stone
        weight_per_ratio = total_weight / total_ratio
        cement_weight = weight_per_ratio * ratio_cement

title: Math23k_9314
description: Question:某区100个外语教师懂英语或俄语，其中懂英语的75人，既懂英语又懂俄语的20人，那么懂俄语的教师为多少人．
full litex:
claim:
    forall e, r, both, total R:
        e = 75
        both = 20
        total = 100
        total = e + r - both
        =>:
            r = 45
    prove:
        total = e + r - both
        100 = 75 + r - 20
        100 = 55 + r
        r = 100 - 55 = 45

title: Math23k_6086
description: Question:1000千克青菜，早晨测得它的含水率是97%，下午测得它的含水率是95%，那么这些菜重量减少了多少千克．

        morning_weight = 1000
        dry_weight = morning_weight * 0.03
        0.05 * afternoon_weight = dry_weight
        water_loss = morning_weight - afternoon_weight
        =>:
            water_loss = 400
    prove:

        0.05 * afternoon_weight = 30
        afternoon_weight = 30 / 0.05 = 600
        water_loss = 1000 - 600 = 400

title: Math23k_15969
description: Question:政府关心农民就医，在农村实行合作医疗保险．农村合作医疗的缴费标准是每人100元（保期从参保之日起一年）．其中，被保人个人缴纳(1/5)，其余部分由政府财政负担．新塘村有村民1200人，问这一年政府给新塘村负担多少医疗保险金？

        personal_contribution = 100 * (1 / 5)
        government_contribution = 100 - personal_contribution
        total_people = 1200
        total_government_contribution = government_contribution * total_people
        =>:
            total_government_contribution = 96000

        personal_contribution = 100 * (1 / 5) = 20
        government_contribution = 100 - 20 = 80
        total_government_contribution = 80 * 1200 = 96000

title: Math23k_8920
description: Question:口袋中有大小、材质相同的红球3个，白球4个和黑球5个，要想使从中摸出一个红球的可能性是(1/2)，应该再往口袋中放多少个红球．
full litex:
know @ratio_to_equation(a, b R):
    b > 0
    (a / b) = 1/2
    =>:
        2 * a = b

know @equal_subtract_right_to_zero(a, b R):
    a = b
    =>:
        a - b = 0

know @sub_eq_zero_implies_eq(a, b R):
    a - b = 0
    =>:
        a = b

claim:
    forall red0, white0, black0, total0, x, a, b, prob R:
        red0 = 3
        white0 = 4
        black0 = 5
        total0 = red0 + white0 + black0
        a = red0 + x
        b = total0 + x
        prob = a / b
        b > 0
        prob = 1/2
        =>:
            x = 6
    prove:
        total0 = red0 + white0 + black0
        total0 = 3 + 4 + 5
        total0 = 12

        a = red0 + x
        a = 3 + x

        b = total0 + x
        b = 12 + x

        prob = a / b
        prob = (3 + x) / (12 + x)
        prob = 1/2

        $ratio_to_equation(a, b)
        2 * a = b
        2 * a = 2 * (3 + x)
        2 * (3 + x) = b
        2 * (3 + x) = 12 + x

        $equal_subtract_right_to_zero(2 * (3 + x), 12 + x)
        2 * (3 + x) - (12 + x) = 0

        =:
            2 * (3 + x) - (12 + x)
            6 + 2 * x - 12 - x
            x - 6

        x - 6 = 0
        $sub_eq_zero_implies_eq(x, 6)
        x = 6

title: Math23k_7812
description: Question:玲玲设计了一个“摸奖”活动方案．如果要使每个同学获奖的可能性为(1/4)，她先往盒子里放进2张“有奖”的纸条，还要往盒子里放进多少张“无奖”的纸条．
full litex:
know @mul_div_cancel(a, x R):
    x != 0
    =>:
        (a / x) * x = a

know @cancel_quarter_four(y R):
    =>:
        ((1/4) * y) * 4 = y

claim:
    forall total, win, lose R:
        win = 2
        total != 0
        2 / total = 1 / 4
        lose = total - win
        =>:
            lose = 6
    prove:
        (2 / total) * total = (1 / 4) * total
        $mul_div_cancel(2, total)
        (2 / total) * total = 2
        2 = (1 / 4) * total
        2 * 4 = ((1 / 4) * total) * 4
        $cancel_quarter_four(total)
        2 * 4 = total
        2 * 4 = 8
        total = 8
        lose = total - win
        lose = 8 - 2
        lose = 6

title: Math23k_2794
description: Question:一个盒子里有多少个红球，8个白球，随便摸出一个球，摸到红球的可能性是(2/3)，摸到白球的可能性是(1/3)．
full litex:
know @cross_multiply(a, b, c, d R):
    a / b = c / d
    =>:
        a * d = b * c

claim:
    forall red, white N_pos:
        white = 8
        red / (red + white) = 2 / 3
        =>:
            red = 16
    prove:
        $cross_multiply(red, red + white, 2, 3)
        3 * red = 2 * (red + white)
        3 * red = 2 * red + 2 * white
        3 * red - 2 * red = 2 * white
        red = 2 * white
        red = 2 * 8
        red = 16

title: Math23k_1552

title: Math23k_23053

title: Math23k_19047

    forall total_bonus, original_per_person, actual_per_person R:
        original_per_person = total_bonus / 8
        actual_per_person = total_bonus / 7
        actual_per_person = original_per_person + 2
        =>:
            total_bonus = 112
    prove:

title: Math23k_8419
description: Question:李刚看一本书，第一天看了全书的(1/5)，第二天看了24页，第3天看的页数是前两天看的总数的150%，这时还剩下全书的(1/4)没有看．问全书共有多页？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_pages, day1_pages, day2_pages, day3_pages, remaining_pages R:
        day1_pages = total_pages / 5
        day2_pages = 24
        day3_pages = 1.5 * (day1_pages + day2_pages)
        remaining_pages = total_pages / 4
        day1_pages + day2_pages + day3_pages + remaining_pages = total_pages
        =>:
            total_pages = 240
    prove:
        day1_pages = total_pages / 5
        day3_pages = 1.5 * (total_pages / 5 + 24)
        remaining_pages = total_pages / 4
        total_pages / 5 + 24 + 1.5 * (total_pages / 5 + 24) + total_pages / 4 = total_pages
        total_pages / 5 + 24 + 1.5 * total_pages / 5 + 36 + total_pages / 4 = total_pages
        total_pages / 5 + 1.5 * total_pages / 5 + total_pages / 4 + 60 = total_pages
        2.5 * total_pages / 5 + total_pages / 4 + 60 = total_pages
        total_pages / 2 + total_pages / 4 + 60 = total_pages
        3 * total_pages / 4 + 60 = total_pages
        60 = total_pages - 3 * total_pages / 4
        60 = total_pages / 4
        total_pages = 60 * 4
        total_pages = 240

title: Math23k_2386
description: Question:甲、乙合做一件工作，甲做的部分占乙的(2/5)，乙做的占全部工作的多少．
full litex:
know @cancellation_in_fraction(x, k R):
    not x = 0
    not k = 0
    =>:
        x / (k * x) = 1 / k

know @prod_nonzero(a, b R):
    not a = 0
    not b = 0
    =>:
        not a * b = 0

claim:
    forall B, A, total R:
        A = (2/5) * B
        total = B + A
        not B = 0
        not (7/5) = 0
        =>:
            B / total = 5/7
    prove:
        total = B + A
        total = B + (2/5) * B
        total = (1 + 2/5) * B
        1 + 2/5 = 7/5
        total = (7/5) * B
        $prod_nonzero(7/5, B)
        not ((7/5) * B) = 0
        not total = 0
        $cancellation_in_fraction(B, 7/5)
        =:
            B / total
            B / ((7/5) * B)
            1 / (7/5)
            5/7

title: Math23k_18929
description: Question:一根电线，第一次用去全长的12.5%，第二次用去23米，这时已用的和没用的电线的长度比是4：5，这根电线原来长多少米？
full litex:
know @proportion_cross(a, b, c, d R):
    a / b = c / d
    =>:
        a * d = b * c

claim:
    forall x, used1, used2, used_total, unused R:
        used1 = (1/8) * x
        used2 = 23
        used_total = used1 + used2
        unused = x - used_total
        used_total / unused = 4 / 5
        =>:
            x = 72
    prove:
        used1 = (1/8) * x
        used2 = 23
        used_total = used1 + used2
        unused = x - used_total

        used_total / unused = 4 / 5
        $proportion_cross(used_total, unused, 4, 5)
        5 * used_total = 4 * unused

        =:
            5 * used_total
            5 * (used1 + used2)
            5 * ((1/8) * x + 23)
            (5/8) * x + 115

        =:
            4 * unused
            4 * (x - used_total)
            4 * (x - (used1 + used2))
            4 * (x - ((1/8) * x + 23))
            4 * ((7/8) * x - 23)
            (7/2) * x - 92

        (5/8) * x + 115 = (7/2) * x - 92
        (5/8) * x + 115 + 92 = (7/2) * x
        (5/8) * x + 207 = (7/2) * x
        207 = (7/2) * x - (5/8) * x

        =:
            (7/2) * x - (5/8) * x
            ((7/2) - (5/8)) * x
            ((28/8) - (5/8)) * x
            (23/8) * x

        207 = (23/8) * x
        207 * 8 = 23 * x
        1656 = 23 * x
        x = 1656 / 23
        x = 72

title: Math23k_13637
description: Question:如果甲数的(3/5)和乙数的(3/8)相等，甲数是40，则甲数比乙数少多少%．
full litex:
know @solve_ax_eq_b(a, x, b R):
    a != 0
    a * x = b
    =>:
        x = b / a

claim:
    forall jia, yi, three_over_five, three_over_eight, lhs, rhs, diff, percent R:
        jia = 40
        three_over_five = 3/5
        three_over_eight = 3/8
        lhs = three_over_five * jia
        rhs = three_over_eight * yi
        lhs = rhs
        diff = yi - jia
        percent = diff / yi * 100
        =>:
            percent = 37.5
    prove:
        lhs = (3/5) * 40
        lhs = 24
        lhs = rhs
        rhs = (3/8) * yi
        24 = rhs
        24 = (3/8) * yi
        (3/8) * yi = 24
        $solve_ax_eq_b(3/8, yi, 24)
        yi = 24 / (3/8)
        yi = (24 * 8) / 3
        yi = 64
        diff = yi - jia
        diff = 64 - 40
        diff = 24
        percent = diff / yi * 100
        percent = (24 / 64) * 100
        percent = (3/8) * 100
        percent = 0.375 * 100
        percent = 37.5

description: Question:去年某校参加数学奥林匹克竞赛的学生中，女生占总数的(1/4)，今年全校参赛的学生增加了20%，女生占总数的(1/3)，与去年相比，今年参赛的女生人数增加了多少%．

        increase_girls = this_girls - last_girls
        increase_girls = ((2/5) * x) - ((1/4) * x)
        increase_girls = ((2/5) - (1/4)) * x
        increase_girls = ((8/20) - (5/20)) * x
        increase_girls = (3/20) * x

        ratio = increase_girls / last_girls
        ratio = ((3/20) * x) / ((1/4) * x)
        ratio = (3/20) / (1/4)
        ratio = (3/20) * (4/1)
        ratio = 12 / 20
        ratio = 3 / 5

        percent = ratio * 100
        percent = (3/5) * 100
        percent = 60

title: Math23k_20985
description: Question:某车间计划生产3000个零件，生产8天后，已经完成(2/5)，照这样计算，这批零件多少天可完成？

    forall total_parts, completed_parts, daily_production, remaining_parts, remaining_days, total_days R:
        total_parts = 3000
        completed_parts = total_parts * (2 / 5)
        daily_production = completed_parts / 8
        remaining_parts = total_parts - completed_parts
        remaining_days = remaining_parts / daily_production
        total_days = 8 + remaining_days
        =>:
            total_days = 20
    prove:
        completed_parts = 3000 * (2 / 5) = 1200
        daily_production = 1200 / 8 = 150
        remaining_parts = 3000 - 1200 = 1800
        remaining_days = 1800 / 150 = 12
        total_days = 8 + 12 = 20

title: Math23k_8290
description: Question:某校学生在操场上排队做操，只知人数在90～110之间，如果排成3列不多也不少；如果排成5列则少2人；如果排成7列则少4人．共有学生多少人．
full litex:
know @combine_5_7_to_35(n, k5, k7, p N_pos):
    n = 5 * k5 + 3
    n = 7 * k7 + 3
    =>:
        n = 35 * p + 3

know @p_multi3_if_n_equal_forms(n, p, s, q N_pos):
    n = 35 * p + 3
    n = 3 * s
    =>:
        p = 3 * q

know @q_eq_1_from_bounds(n, q N_pos):
    n = 105 * q + 3
    90 <= n
    n <= 110
    =>:
        q = 1

claim:
    forall n, k5, k7, s, p, q N_pos:
        90 <= n
        n <= 110
        n = 3 * s
        n = 5 * k5 + 3
        n = 7 * k7 + 3
        =>:
            n = 108
    prove:
        $combine_5_7_to_35(n, k5, k7, p)
        n = 35 * p + 3

        $p_multi3_if_n_equal_forms(n, p, s, q)
        p = 3 * q

        =:
            n
            35 * p + 3
            35 * (3 * q) + 3
            105 * q + 3

        $q_eq_1_from_bounds(n, q)
        q = 1

        =:
            n
            105 * q + 3
            105 * 1 + 3
            105 + 3
            108

title: Math23k_5757
description: Question:鸡的只数比鸭少20%，鸭的只数比鸡多百分之几？
full litex:
know @positive_times_positive_is_positive(a, b R):
    a > 0
    b > 0
    =>:
        a * b > 0

know @positive_not_zero(x R):
    x > 0
    =>:
        not x = 0

know @cancel_common_nonzero_factor(x, y, k R):
    not k = 0
    =>:
        (x * k) / (y * k) = x / y

claim:
    forall c, d, diff, ratio, percent R:
        d > 0
        c = d - (1/5) * d
        diff = d - c
        ratio = diff / c
        percent = ratio * 100
        =>:
            percent = 25
    prove:
        c = d - (1/5) * d
        c = (1 - 1/5) * d
        c = (4/5) * d

        diff = d - c
        diff = d - (4/5) * d
        diff = (1 - 4/5) * d
        diff = (1/5) * d

        4/5 > 0
        $positive_times_positive_is_positive(4/5, d)
        (4/5) * d > 0
        c = (4/5) * d
        c > 0
        $positive_not_zero(c)
        not c = 0

        ratio = diff / c
        ratio = ((1/5) * d) / ((4/5) * d)
        $positive_not_zero(d)
        not d = 0
        $cancel_common_nonzero_factor(1/5, 4/5, d)
        ((1/5) * d) / ((4/5) * d) = (1/5) / (4/5)
        ratio = (1/5) / (4/5)
        ratio = 1/4

        percent = ratio * 100
        percent = (1/4) * 100
        percent = 25

title: Math23k_124
description: Question:小明看一全书，第一天看了全书的30%，第二天看了15页，这时已看的和未看的页数的比是2：3，这本书有多少页？
full litex:
know @cross_multiply(a, b, c, d R):
    b != 0
    d != 0
    a / b = c / d
    =>:
        a * d = c * b

know @add_equal_both_sides(a, b, c R):
    a = b
    =>:
        a + c = b + c

know @linear_divide(a, x, b R):
    a != 0
    a * x = b
    =>:
        x = b / a

claim:
    forall x, day1_ratio, day2_pages, ratio_num, ratio_den, read_total, unread R:
        day1_ratio = 3/10
        day2_pages = 15
        ratio_num = 2
        ratio_den = 3
        read_total = day1_ratio * x + day2_pages
        unread = x - read_total
        ratio_den != 0
        unread != 0
        5 != 0
        (1/10) != 0
        read_total / unread = ratio_num / ratio_den
        =>:
            x = 150
    prove:
        read_total = (3/10) * x + 15
        unread = x - read_total
        unread = x - ((3/10) * x + 15)
        unread = x - (3/10) * x - 15
        1 - 3/10 = 7/10
        unread = (7/10) * x - 15

        $cross_multiply(read_total, unread, ratio_num, ratio_den)
        read_total * ratio_den = ratio_num * unread
        3 * read_total = 2 * unread

        unread = x - read_total
        =:
            2 * unread
            2 * (x - read_total)
            2 * x - 2 * read_total

        3 * read_total = 2 * x - 2 * read_total
        $add_equal_both_sides(3 * read_total, 2 * x - 2 * read_total, 2 * read_total)
        3 * read_total + 2 * read_total = 2 * x - 2 * read_total + 2 * read_total

        =:
            3 * read_total + 2 * read_total
            (3 + 2) * read_total
            5 * read_total
        =:
            2 * x - 2 * read_total + 2 * read_total
            2 * x + (-2 * read_total + 2 * read_total)
            2 * x + 0
            2 * x

        5 * read_total = 2 * x
        $linear_divide(5, read_total, 2 * x)
        read_total = (2 * x) / 5
        read_total = (2/5) * x

        read_total = (3/10) * x + 15
        (3/10) * x + 15 = (2/5) * x
        $add_equal_both_sides((3/10) * x + 15, (2/5) * x, -(3/10) * x)
        (3/10) * x + 15 - (3/10) * x = (2/5) * x - (3/10) * x

        =:
            (3/10) * x + 15 - (3/10) * x
            ((3/10) * x - (3/10) * x) + 15
            0 + 15
            15
        =:
            (2/5) * x - (3/10) * x
            ((2/5) - (3/10)) * x
            (4/10 - 3/10) * x
            (1/10) * x

        15 = (1/10) * x
        $linear_divide(1/10, x, 15)
        x = 15 / (1/10)
        x = 150

title: Math23k_5570

title: Math23k_10415
description: Question:一辆客车和一辆货车分别从A、B两地同时出发相对而行．客车每小时行80千米，货车每小时行全程的(1/12)．当货车行至全程的(2/3)时，客车再行全程的(1/9)到达B地．求AB两地相距多少千米？
full litex:
know @left_cancel_mul_nonzero(a, b, c R):
    not a = 0
    a * b = a * c
    =>:
        b = c

know @npos_nonzero(n N_pos):
    =>:
        not n = 0

claim:
    forall x N_pos, v_bus, v_truck, frac_partial, frac_remaining, t, dist_truck_partial, dist_bus_first, equation_lhs, equation_rhs R:
        v_bus = 80
        frac_partial = 2/3
        frac_remaining = 1/9
        v_truck = x / 12
        dist_truck_partial = x * frac_partial
        dist_truck_partial = v_truck * t
        dist_bus_first = v_bus * t
        equation_lhs = dist_bus_first + x * frac_remaining
        equation_rhs = x
        equation_lhs = equation_rhs
        =>:
            x = 720
    prove:
        dist_truck_partial = x * (2/3)
        12 * dist_truck_partial = 12 * (v_truck * t)
        =:
            12 * dist_truck_partial
            12 * (x * (2/3))
            (12 * (2/3)) * x
            8 * x
        =:
            12 * (v_truck * t)
            (12 * v_truck) * t
            (12 * (x / 12)) * t
            x * t
        =:
            8 * x
            x * 8
        $npos_nonzero(x)
        $left_cancel_mul_nonzero(x, 8, t)
        8 = t

        dist_bus_first = v_bus * t
        dist_bus_first = 80 * 8
        dist_bus_first = 640

        x * frac_remaining = x * (1/9)
        x * (1/9) = x / 9
        equation_lhs = dist_bus_first + x * frac_remaining
        equation_lhs = 640 + x * (1/9)
        equation_lhs = 640 + x / 9
        equation_rhs = x
        equation_lhs = equation_rhs

        640 + x / 9 = x
        640 = x - x / 9
        x - x / 9 = (9 * x - x) / 9
        x - x / 9 = 8 * x / 9
        640 = 8 * x / 9
        640 * 9 = 8 * x
        5760 = 8 * x
        x = 5760 / 8
        x = 720

title: Math23k_1522
description: Question:我校六年级上学期有学生240人，其中男生占(1/4)，本学期又转来若干名男生，这样男生人数占六年级总人数的(1/3)，本学期转来多少名男生？
full litex:
know @cross_multiply(a, b, c, d R):
    b != 0
    d != 0
    a / b = c / d
    =>:
        a * d = c * b

know @mul_div_cancel_left(k, y R):
    k != 0
    =>:
        (k * y) / k = y

claim:
    forall total_prev, male_ratio_prev, male_prev, x, total_now, male_now, male_ratio_now R:
        total_prev = 240
        male_ratio_prev = 1/4
        male_prev = total_prev * male_ratio_prev
        male_now = male_prev + x
        total_now = total_prev + x
        male_ratio_now = 1/3
        total_now != 0
        3 != 0
        2 != 0
        male_now / total_now = male_ratio_now
        =>:
            x = 30
    prove:
        male_prev = 240 * (1/4)
        male_prev = 60

        male_now = 60 + x
        total_now = 240 + x
        male_ratio_now = 1/3
        male_now / total_now = 1/3

        $cross_multiply(male_now, total_now, 1, 3)
        male_now * 3 = 1 * total_now
        1 * total_now = total_now
        male_now * 3 = total_now

        male_now = 60 + x
        (60 + x) * 3 = total_now
        3 * (60 + x) = total_now

        total_now = 240 + x
        3 * (60 + x) = 240 + x

        3 * (60 + x) = 3 * 60 + 3 * x
        3 * 60 = 180
        3 * 60 + 3 * x = 180 + 3 * x
        3 * (60 + x) = 180 + 3 * x

        180 + 3 * x = 240 + x

        (180 + 3 * x) - 180 = (240 + x) - 180
        3 * x = (240 + x) - 180
        (240 + x) - 180 = 240 - 180 + x
        240 - 180 = 60
        3 * x = 60 + x

        (3 * x) - x = (60 + x) - x
        (60 + x) - x = 60
        (3 * x) - x = 60
        2 * x = 60

        (2 * x) / 2 = 60 / 2
        $mul_div_cancel_left(2, x)
        (2 * x) / 2 = x
        x = 60 / 2
        60 / 2 = 30
        x = 30

title: Math23k_348
description: Question:某次竞赛共有25道题，规定做对一题得8分，做错或不做一题倒扣4分．此次竞赛小明得了128分，那么，他做对了多少道题．

        total_questions = 25
        score = 8 * x - 4 * (total_questions - x)
        score = 128
        =>:
            x = 19
    prove:
        score = 8 * x - 4 * (25 - x)
        score = 8 * x - 4 * 25 + 4 * x
        score = 8 * x - 100 + 4 * x
        score = 12 * x - 100

        12 * x = 128 + 100
        12 * x = 228
        x = 228 / 12
        x = 19

title: Math23k_18179
description: Question:一箱桃子分给甲、乙、丙，甲分得了全部的(1/4)+7个，乙分得了全部的(1/5)+5个，丙分得其余的一半，最后剩下的是全部的(1/8)，这箱桃子有几个？
full litex:
know @mul_preserves_equality(a, b, k R):
    a = b
    =>:
        k * a = k * b
know @add_preserves_equality(a, b, k R):
    a = b
    =>:
        a + k = b + k

claim:
    forall x, a_share, b_share, ab_sum, rem_after_ab, c_share, leftover R:
        a_share = (1/4) * x + 7
        b_share = (1/5) * x + 5
        ab_sum = a_share + b_share
        rem_after_ab = x - ab_sum
        c_share = (1/2) * rem_after_ab
        leftover = (1/2) * rem_after_ab
        leftover = (1/8) * x
        =>:
            x = 40
    prove:
        =:
            ab_sum
            a_share + b_share
            ((1/4) * x + 7) + ((1/5) * x + 5)
            (1/4) * x + (1/5) * x + 7 + 5
            (1/4) * x + (1/5) * x + 12
            (5/20) * x + (4/20) * x + 12
            (9/20) * x + 12

        =:
            rem_after_ab
            x - ab_sum
            x - ((9/20) * x + 12)
            x - (9/20) * x - 12
            (20/20) * x - (9/20) * x - 12
            (11/20) * x - 12

        =:
            c_share
            (1/2) * rem_after_ab
            (1/2) * ((11/20) * x - 12)
            (11/40) * x - 6

        =:
            leftover
            (1/2) * rem_after_ab
            (1/2) * ((11/20) * x - 12)
            (11/40) * x - 6

        =:
            (11/40) * x - 6
            leftover
            (1/8) * x

        $mul_preserves_equality((11/40) * x - 6, (1/8) * x, 40)

        =:
            11 * x - 240
            40 * ((11/40) * x - 6)
            40 * ((1/8) * x)
            5 * x

        $add_preserves_equality(11 * x - 240, 5 * x, 240)

        =:
            11 * x
            (11 * x - 240) + 240
            (5 * x) + 240
            5 * x + 240

        $add_preserves_equality(11 * x, 5 * x + 240, -5 * x)

        =:
            11 * x + (-5 * x)
            6 * x
        =:
            (5 * x + 240) + (-5 * x)
            (5 * x + -5 * x) + 240
            0 + 240
            240

        $mul_preserves_equality(6 * x, 240, 1/6)

        =:
            (1/6) * (6 * x)
            x
        =:
            (1/6) * 240
            240 / 6
            40

title: Math23k_12229
description: Question:小强参加学校体育集训队后，跑100米的时间从原来的18秒缩短到15秒，小强跑百米的速度比原来提高了百分之几？（百分号前保留一位小数）
full litex:
claim:
    forall original_time, new_time, original_speed, new_speed, speed_increase, percentage_increase R:
        original_time = 18
        new_time = 15
        original_speed = 100 / original_time
        new_speed = 100 / new_time
        speed_increase = new_speed - original_speed
        percentage_increase = (speed_increase / original_speed) * 100
        =>:
            percentage_increase = 20
    prove:
        original_speed = 100 / 18
        new_speed = 100 / 15
        speed_increase = (100 / 15) - (100 / 18)
        speed_increase = (100 * 18 - 100 * 15) / (15 * 18) = (1800 - 1500) / 270 = 300 / 270 = 10 / 9
        percentage_increase = ((10 / 9) / (100 / 18)) * 100
        percentage_increase = (10 / 9) * (18 / 100) * 100
        percentage_increase = (10 * 18) / (9 * 100) * 100 = 180 / 900 * 100 = 0.2 * 100 = 20

title: Math23k_2555
description: Question:A是B的(1/5)，C是B的(1/4)，A是C的多少．
full litex:
know @cancel_common_factor(x, y, z R):
    y != 0
    z != 0
    =>:
        (x * y) / (z * y) = x / z

know @divide_by_unit_fraction(x, n R):
    n != 0
    =>:
        x / (1 / n) = x * n

claim:
    forall a, b, c, ratio R:
        a = (1/5) * b
        c = (1/4) * b
        b != 0
        c != 0
        ratio = a / c
        =>:
            ratio = 4/5
    prove:
        ratio = a / c
        a = (1/5) * b
        a / c = ((1/5) * b) / c
        c = (1/4) * b
        ((1/5) * b) / c = ((1/5) * b) / ((1/4) * b)
        $cancel_common_factor(1/5, b, 1/4)
        ((1/5) * b) / ((1/4) * b) = (1/5) / (1/4)
        ratio = (1/5) / (1/4)
        $divide_by_unit_fraction(1/5, 4)
        (1/5) / (1/4) = (1/5) * 4
        ratio = (1/5) * 4
        ratio = 4/5

title: Math23k_21305
description: Question:学校组织学生到奇怪道科技馆参观，并将参观人数平均分成12个小组，每个小组由4名学生和2名老师．参观的学生平均乘坐8辆汽车，每辆车乘坐多少名学生？

        total_groups = 12

        total_people = total_groups * (students_per_group + teachers_per_group)
        total_students = total_groups * students_per_group

title: Math23k_11273
description: Question:小明读一本书，第一天读了全书的(3/14)，第二天比第一天多读26页，这时已读的与剩下的页数比是7：5，这本书小明还有多少页没读？
full litex:
claim:
    forall x R, first_day R, second_day R, total_read R, left_pages R:
        first_day = (3/14) * x
        second_day = first_day + 26
        total_read = first_day + second_day
        left_pages = x - total_read
        5 * total_read = 7 * left_pages
        =>:
            left_pages = 70
    prove:
        =:
            total_read
            first_day + second_day
            (3/14) * x + (first_day + 26)
            (3/14) * x + ((3/14) * x + 26)
            (6/14) * x + 26
            (3/7) * x + 26

        =:
            7 * left_pages
            7 * (x - total_read)
            7 * x - 7 * total_read
        5 * total_read = 7 * x - 7 * total_read
        5 * total_read + 7 * total_read = 7 * x
        12 * total_read = 7 * x

        =:
            total_read
            (3/7) * x + 26
        12 * total_read = 7 * x
        =:
            12 * total_read
            12 * ((3/7) * x + 26)
        12 * ((3/7) * x + 26) = 7 * x
        =:
            12 * ((3/7) * x + 26)
            12 * (3/7 * x) + 12 * 26
            (12 * 3 / 7) * x + 312
            (36/7) * x + 312
        (36/7) * x + 312 = 7 * x

        7 * ((36/7) * x + 312) = 7 * (7 * x)
        =:
            7 * ((36/7) * x + 312)
            7 * ((36/7) * x) + 7 * 312
            (7 * 36 / 7) * x + 2184
            36 * x + 2184
        =:
            7 * (7 * x)
            49 * x

        36 * x + 2184 = 49 * x
        2184 = 49 * x - 36 * x
        2184 = 13 * x
        x = 2184 / 13
        x = 168

        =:
            (3/7) * x
            (3/7) * 168
            72
        total_read = (3/7) * x + 26
        total_read = 72 + 26
        total_read = 98

        left_pages = x - total_read
        =:
            x - total_read
            168 - 98
            70

title: Math23k_5975

title: Math23k_9737

        apple_count > 0
        pear_count = apple_count - (3/10) * apple_count
        ratio = pear_count / apple_count
        percent = ratio * 100
        =>:
            percent = 70
    prove:
        pear_count = apple_count - (3/10) * apple_count
        pear_count = (1 - 3/10) * apple_count
        1 - 3/10 = 7/10

title: Math23k_6632
description: Question:师徒两人合做一批零件，徒弟做了总数(2/7)，比师傅少做21个，这批零件有多少个？
full litex:
claim:
    forall x, apprentice, master R:
        apprentice = (2 / 7) * x
        master = apprentice + 21
        x = apprentice + master
        =>:
            x = 49
    prove:
        x = apprentice + (apprentice + 21) = 2 * apprentice + 21
        x = 2 * (2 / 7 * x) + 21
        x = (4 / 7) * x + 21
        x - (4 / 7) * x = 21
        (3 / 7) * x = 21
        x = 21 * (7 / 3)
        x = 49

title: Math23k_10256
description: Question:小明把自己画片的(1/6)给妹妹，这时妹妹的画片数正好是小明的(3/5)，已知妹妹原有画片17张，小明原有画片多少张？（列式解答）
full litex:
claim:
    forall x, sister_initial, sister_final, ming_final R:
        sister_initial = 17
        sister_final = sister_initial + x / 6
        ming_final = 5 / 6 * x
        sister_final = 3 / 5 * ming_final
        =>:
            x = 51
    prove:
        sister_final = 17 + x / 6
        ming_final = 5 / 6 * x
        sister_final = 3 / 5 * (5 / 6 * x) = 1 / 2 * x
        17 + x / 6 = 1 / 2 * x
        17 = 1 / 2 * x - 1 / 6 * x
        17 = 3 / 6 * x - 1 / 6 * x
        17 = 2 / 6 * x = 1 / 3 * x
        x = 17 * 3 = 51

title: Math23k_13514
description: Question:一个比的前项是(1/2)，比值是(1/3)，后项=．

know @division_to_multiplication(a, b, c R):
    a / b = c
    =>:
        a = b * c

claim:

        antecedent = 1/2
        ratio = 1/3
        antecedent / x = ratio
        =>:
            x = 3/2
    prove:
        $division_to_multiplication(antecedent, x, ratio)
        antecedent = x * ratio
        ratio * 3 = (1/3) * 3
        ratio * 3 = 1
        =:
            x
            x * 1
            x * (ratio * 3)
            (x * ratio) * 3
            antecedent * 3
            (1/2) * 3
            3/2

title: Math23k_694

        time_A = distance_A / speed_A
        distance_B = distance_AB - distance_A
        time_B = distance_B / speed_B
        early_start = time_B - time_A
        =>:

        total = read + unread
        =>:

title: Math23k_19471

title: Math23k_18030
description: Question:一辆汽车从甲地到乙地，第一小时行了全长的20%，第二小时比第一小时多行15千米，离乙地还有165千米，甲、乙两地相距多少千米？
full litex:
claim:
    forall distance, first_hour, second_hour R:
        first_hour = 0.2 * distance
        second_hour = first_hour + 15
        first_hour + second_hour + 165 = distance
        =>:
            distance = 300
    prove:
        first_hour + second_hour + 165 = 0.2 * distance + (0.2 * distance + 15) + 165 = 0.4 * distance + 180
        0.4 * distance + 180 = distance
        180 = distance - 0.4 * distance
        180 = 0.6 * distance
        distance = 180 / 0.6 = 300

description: Question:光明小学三年级和四年级要给780棵树浇水，三年级每天浇60棵，浇了7天，剩下的由四年级来浇，4天浇完，平均每天浇多少棵？

claim:
    forall total_trees, grade3_daily, grade3_days, grade3_total, remaining_trees, grade4_days, grade4_daily R:
        total_trees = 780
        grade3_daily = 60
        grade3_days = 7
        grade4_days = 4
        grade3_total = grade3_daily * grade3_days
        remaining_trees = total_trees - grade3_total
        grade4_daily = remaining_trees / grade4_days
        =>:
            grade4_daily = 90
    prove:
        grade3_total = 60 * 7 = 420
        remaining_trees = 780 - 420 = 360
        grade4_daily = 360 / 4 = 90

title: Math23k_6506

title: Math23k_11318
description: Question:在400米长的环形跑道上，甲、乙二人同时同地同向跑步，甲每秒跑5米，乙每秒跑3米，两人起跑后的第一次相遇点在起跑线前多少米？
full litex:
claim:
    forall track_length, speed_jia, speed_yi, relative_speed, time, distance_jia, distance_from_start R:
        track_length = 400
        speed_jia = 5
        speed_yi = 3
        relative_speed = speed_jia - speed_yi
        time = track_length / relative_speed
        distance_jia = speed_jia * time
        distance_from_start = distance_jia % track_length
        =>:
            distance_from_start = 200
    prove:
        relative_speed = 5 - 3 = 2
        time = 400 / 2 = 200
        distance_jia = 5 * 200 = 1000
        distance_from_start = 1000 % 400 = 200

title: Math23k_9992
description: Question:乘数是10，积比被乘数多180，被乘数=．
full litex:
claim:
    forall multiplier, product, multiplicand R:
        multiplier = 10
        product = multiplier * multiplicand
        product = multiplicand + 180
        =>:
            multiplicand = 20
    prove:
        product = 10 * multiplicand
        10 * multiplicand = multiplicand + 180
        10 * multiplicand - multiplicand = 180
        9 * multiplicand = 180
        multiplicand = 180 / 9 = 20

title: Math23k_1619
description: Question:一种超级DVD影碟机，商店将进价加40%定价．然后按定价的90%出售，并且每台送“的士”费50元，这样每台仍可以获利润（赚）262元，求这种影碟机每台的进价=多少元？
full litex:
claim:
    forall cost_price, marked_price, actual_price, profit R:
        marked_price = cost_price * 1.4
        actual_price = marked_price * 0.9
        profit = actual_price - cost_price - 50
        profit = 262
        =>:
            cost_price = 1200
    prove:
        profit = 262
        actual_price = marked_price * 0.9
        marked_price = cost_price * 1.4
        actual_price = cost_price * 1.4 * 0.9 = cost_price * 1.26
        profit = cost_price * 1.26 - cost_price - 50 = cost_price * 0.26 - 50
        cost_price * 0.26 - 50 = 262
        cost_price * 0.26 = 262 + 50 = 312
        cost_price = 312 / 0.26 = 1200

        remaining_length = total_length - (rate_alone * days_alone)

        total_days = days_alone + days_team

title: Math23k_16825
description: Question:果商站最近来了若干箱水果，第一天卖出总数的(1/3)还多2箱，第二天卖出的比剩下的(1/2)还少1箱，这时还剩余38箱没卖．问这批水果一共有多少箱？

    forall x, first_day, remaining_after_first, second_day, remaining_after_second R:
        first_day = (1 / 3) * x + 2

title: Math23k_2618
description: Question:甲班和乙班共83人，乙班和丙班共86人，丙班和丁班共88人，问甲班和丁班共多少人？
full litex:
claim:
    forall A1, B1, C1, D1, sum_AB, sum_BC, sum_CD, diff, AD N_pos:
        sum_AB = A1 + B1
        sum_BC = B1 + C1
        sum_CD = C1 + D1

        sum_AB = 83
        sum_BC = 86
        sum_CD = 88

        diff = sum_BC - sum_AB
        AD = A1 + D1
        =>:
            AD = 85
    prove:
        =:
            diff
            sum_BC - sum_AB
            (B1 + C1) - (A1 + B1)
            C1 - A1

        =:
            diff
            86 - 83
            3

        =:
            C1 - A1
            diff
            3

        =:
            (C1 + D1) - AD
            (C1 + D1) - (A1 + D1)
            C1 - A1
            3

        =:
            C1 + D1
            sum_CD
            88

        =:
            (C1 + D1) - AD
            88 - AD

        88 - AD = 3
        AD = 88 - 3
        AD = 85

title: Math23k_17180
description: Question:修一条路，已修和未修的千米数比是3：5．如果再修12千米，则已修和未修的千米数9：1，这条路共长多少千米？

        (3 / 8) * total_length + 12 = 9 * ( (5 / 8) * total_length - 12 )
        =>:
            total_length = 160 / 7
    prove:
        9 * ( (5 / 8) * total_length - 12 ) = (45 / 8) * total_length - 108
        (3 / 8) * total_length + 12 = (45 / 8) * total_length - 108
        (3 / 8) * total_length + 12 + 108 = (45 / 8) * total_length
        (3 / 8) * total_length + 120 = (45 / 8) * total_length
        120 = (45 / 8) * total_length - (3 / 8) * total_length
        120 = (42 / 8) * total_length

        total_length = 120 * 8 / 42
        total_length = 960 / 42
        total_length = 160 / 7

title: Math23k_17406
description: Question:一次数学测验，全班平均分是91.2分，已知女生有21人，平均每人92分，男生平均每人90.5分．求这个班男生有多少人？
full litex:
know @sub_eq_preserves_equality(a, b, c R):
    a = b
    =>:
        a - c = b - c

claim:
    forall x, girls N_pos, avg_class, avg_girls, avg_boys, total_class, total_girls, total_boys R:
        girls = 21
        avg_class = 91.2
        avg_girls = 92
        avg_boys = 90.5
        total_class = avg_class * (x + girls)
        total_girls = avg_girls * girls
        total_boys = avg_boys * x
        total_class = total_girls + total_boys
        =>:
            x = 24
    prove:
        total_girls = 92 * 21
        total_girls = 1932

        total_class = 91.2 * (x + 21)
        total_class = 91.2 * x + 91.2 * 21
        91.2 * 21 = 1915.2
        total_class = 91.2 * x + 1915.2

        total_boys = 90.5 * x
        total_class = total_girls + total_boys
        total_class = 1932 + 90.5 * x

        91.2 * x + 1915.2 = 1932 + 90.5 * x

        $sub_eq_preserves_equality(91.2 * x + 1915.2, 1932 + 90.5 * x, 90.5 * x)

        =:
            (91.2 * x + 1915.2) - 90.5 * x
            91.2 * x + 1915.2 - 90.5 * x
            0.7 * x + 1915.2

        =:
            (1932 + 90.5 * x) - 90.5 * x
            1932 + 90.5 * x - 90.5 * x
            1932

        $sub_eq_preserves_equality(0.7 * x + 1915.2, 1932, 1915.2)

        =:
            (0.7 * x + 1915.2) - 1915.2
            0.7 * x

        =:
            1932 - 1915.2
            16.8

        0.7 * x = 16.8
        x = 16.8 / 0.7
        x = 24
